Name: Torico's b-day gift hunt
About the game: Torico's b-day gift hunt - Toriko slept peacefully, looking forward to the upcoming party on her birthday, but bad luck - all the gifts were stolen! Restore justice and return the gifts to their place in this game inspired by the classic platformers of the 90s! Explore four different play areas, each populated with unique enemies. Collect coins along the way and buy upgrades for your weapons and amount of health and life in a special magic shop and get to the very end to save Toriko and her holiday! Peculiarities: - 4 different game zones with their own unique enemies - Achievements - Nice soundtrack by Emerald Jak, Freelon-k and Snabisch
